channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Various areas of damaged tarmac one in particular is unavoidable when driving and is large and deep, 26th June
item.description:
Just past the entrance to Almsbury Farm the worst one is on the left hand side but there are 5 or 6 others

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vineyard Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
